name: Snall
description:
Snall is a speedrunning game about a snowball. Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Gifts reset your size and slow you down which can be a good thing or a bad thing since you have to complete it as quick as possible. Enemies do not see you until you reach a certain size so try to collect gifts when they're nearby!

CREDITS:
